com.documentum.fc.client.search

Interface IDfMltExpression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDfExpression

    public interface IDfMltExpression
extends IDfExpression
    Defines a more-like-this expression for the search expression tree with the given object id. It can be added to an IDfExpressionSet.
    See Also:
    IDfQueryBuilder.getRootExpressionSet(), IDfExpressionSet.addFullTextExpression(String)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.documentum.fc.client.search.IDfExpression
